Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://36.media.tumblr.com/5e37da3aa64def9f6fc5287dd24e070a/tumblr_inline_nxpvxvNtRl1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="2516" data-orig-width="2448"><img src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/076b2c677adddb8b1c80b245a3bb9431/tumblr_inline_nxpvzt3gSR1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="2516" data-orig-width="2448"/></figure><p>This lovely portrait of <a href="https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/3sakpe/my_niece_painted_me_this_lovely_portrait/">Jeb screaming</a> was painted by wizardofyendor’s niece! She got talent ! #KSP <br/><br/></p>
Wow, Jeb screaming. That's something you don't see him do often. Nice portrait!

That looks really good. Good Job, Person! (And also Jeb, what are you doing here? You are the top dog of my space program, and you are failing me!)

EDIT: Wait, do I see Final Fantasy 1 for the NES in the corner?
Who forced Jeb to watch MTV? poor Jeb...

she is very good

also, i think you made a typo in the title

That looks really good. Good Job, Person! (And also Jeb, what are you doing here? You are the top dog of my space program, and you are failing me!)

EDIT: Wait, do I see Final Fantasy 1 for the NES in the corner?

yes it is FF1

Jeb Screaming. It was such a rare moment, that they decided it should be commemorated with a portrait.

Nicely done, niece of wizardofyendor.
This is horrible! The Kerbal in the painting looks more like Bob, not Jeb!

[quote name='NeatCrown']This is [I]horrible[/I]! The Kerbal in the painting looks more like Bob, not Jeb![/QUOTE]

HOW DARE YOU SAY SUCH A THING. JEB!!!!! NeatCrown here was saying you look more like Bob. Commence the pain :mad:

Seriously though, that is an awesome picture :) nice job!

[quote name='NeatCrown']This is [I]horrible[/I]! The Kerbal in the painting looks more like Bob, not Jeb![/QUOTE]

Buuuuutttt.... They all look the same.

Note to self: Crop out all but exploding Minionbot. Later.
